title: Biomed Sys & Modeling
description: Introduction of computational systems biology, including the modeling process, various types of models, standard analysis and simulation of systems, and applications in real-world biological systems. Credit will not be awarded for both BMED 3520 and BMED 3510.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BMED 3100 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (BMED 2210 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
